name: Mission-Based Training
description: Scenarios that simulate real-world combat engagements with strategic objectives.

cards.title: Hostage Rescue Simulation
cards.description: Executing a structured rescue operation in a hostile environment.
cards.bulletpoints: Assess threats, secure hostages, extract team safely
cards.summaryText: Orchestrate hostage rescues by triaging threats, locking down the site, and moving hostages and team out cleanly under fire.

cards.title: Night Operations Tactical Raid
cards.description: Executing a mission under low-visibility conditions with stealth tactics.
cards.bulletpoints: Use NVGs effectively, engage in silent takedowns, maintain minimal light exposure
cards.summaryText: Dominate night raids by leveraging NVGs, executing silent takedowns, and keeping light discipline tight to stay invisible.
